Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory690.jpg'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: 'The clang of metal continues amidst fierce explosions. Cultivation tanks break away from their slots, falling into the magma.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lilith', 3: "That's right! Who will burn out first, us or this place? Let's bet on it!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Alpha', 3: 'The battle will end before that.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{3: 'The katana clashes with the opened umbrella once again, splashing numerous sparks.'}
{3: "When this thought flashes through Lilith's mind, she sees Alpha's katana swirling upward into the sky."}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: 'She then takes a sudden kick in her right abdomen.'}
{3: "When Lilith is knocked away, she finally sees Alpha's hand without any weapon in it. The swirling slash was nothing but a feint attack."}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "You are terribly wrong if you think I can't fight without a weapon.", 4: '2'}
{3: "The spinning katana falls back in Alpha's hand. Lilith quickly attempts to summon Punishing Virus to repair herself. However..."}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: "I can't control the virus anymore... Is this your power as an agent?", 4: '1'}

{3: 'Something seems to be interfering with the temporary access given by Vonnegut. It will not turn Lilith into a Corrupted just yet, but is sufficient to prevent her from adjusting her own virus concentration.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Agent... Is that what you think?', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Ui/Spine/UiSpine/UiMovieSpine/UiMovieLuxiya2S/UiMovieLuxiya2S02Role.prefab'}
{3: 'Lilith holds herself up with the moon umbrella as Alpha walks close.'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: 'I surrender. Here is the location of that Babylonia Construct.'}
{3: 'She quickly raises her hands, letting her moon umbrella sway and fall to the ground.'}
{3: "A location appears in Alpha's vision. Lucia is quietly leaning against a tree. Her shoulders are already covered by the fallen snow."}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'I thought you were going to "burn out" with me?'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: 'Even the most insane gambler would not challenge the house when there is no chance of winning.'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: "This place is going to collapse. Babylonia's people will be here at any moment. I would be digging my own grave if I continued to mess around."}
{3: "Lilith's hands remain in the air, as if her madness was just a camouflage."}
{3: "With a move of her finger, a storage unit slides down Lilith's sleeve into her hand. She tosses it to Alpha."}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: "You probably haven't gone to the core database yet. You will need the data in that storage unit, I think."}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Why did you do that?'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: 'Sigh. The most important mission Mr. Vonnegut gave me was to invite you to join us.'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: "But you don't seem keen at all, which makes me wonder... Am I not sincere enough?"}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: 'Can you leave me a message if you are satisfied with my additional service? So I can at least bring something back to him.'}
{3: 'Lilith really takes out a voice recorder from her pocket.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory690.jpg'}
{3: 'Alpha no longer responds. She just turns away and walks out from the exit.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lilith', 3: 'How heartless...', 4: '1'}
{3: "Lilith presses the record button. A bunch of flowers pops out from the recorder's top."}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: 'I prepared this surprise for you. What a waste.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She seems a little upset as she pulls a petal out of the bouquet and tosses the rest on the ground.'}
{3: 'Highly corrosive fluid flows out of the bouquet and rapidly spreads, accelerating the fall of the steel platform underneath.'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: 'Before anyone arrives, this place would have already sunk into the magma.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: 'I better go before little "puppy" finds me.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lilith also disappears into the white mist produced by the reaction between the corrosive fluid and metal.'}
